clinical_history: Patient with unexplained weight loss and fatigue.
findings: Focal consolidation in right lower lobe with air bronchogram.
Well-defined nodule measuring 19 mm in right lower lobe.
Mediastinal widening observed with soft tissue density.
Collapse of right lower lobe lobe with volume loss.
Thoracic aortic aneurysm measuring 49 mm in diameter.
recommendations: Immediate intervention may be required depending on severity.
